title: Madeleine Albright: "Fascism: A Warning"
description: Michael's conversation with the late Secretary of State Madeleine Albright on her New York Times Best Seller, "Facism: A Warning." Albright passed away on 23 March 2022. Original air date 17 April 2018. The book was published on 10 April 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Madeleine Albright)
